articles.description: Indian IT companies may see faster revenue growth starting from Q4FY24 due to a better overall economy and large deal wins, according to BNP Paribas. The firm believes Q3FY24 will be the last quarter of weakness before growth picks up.
articles.content: Indian IT companies may see their revenue grow faster starting from the fourth quarter of the current financial year (Q4FY24) due to the better overall economy and the ramp-up of large deal wins, acc… [+3557 chars]

articles.author: A Ksheerasagar
articles.title: Kalyan Jewellers shares jump over 4% to hit all-time high on strong Q3 update | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Kalyan Jewellers India reported strong performance in terms of foot traffic and revenue in Q3FY24, achieving consolidated revenue growth of 33% compared to the same period last year.
articles.content: Shares of Kalyan Jewellers India, one of India's largest jewellery companies, spiked 4.40% to hit a fresh all-time high of 379.75 apiece during Friday's early trade. This sharp surge came in response… [+3960 chars]
